p: Envisioning of the nanoparticle shape and surface characteristics of the prepared NLCs were performed using TEM (Joel JEM 1230, Tokyo, Japan). The diluted dispersion is negatively stained using a saturated solution of uranyl acetate for 5 min, followed by loading the stained formulation on a copper grid. A drying step of the copper grid lasted for 10 min at 25 °C followed by examination under the transmission electron microscope.
